text:
The legacy of MKUltra continues to influence contemporary debates on

government secrecy, surveillance, and the ethics of psychological

experimentation. The project's history serves as a cautionary tale about the

dangers of unchecked power and the importance of protecting individual

rights and freedoms (7).

New header (similar to existing header)
